name: Rota-a-Block
description:
Welcome to the floating lands of Rotoria. Explore the islands that dot the atmosphere, dodging the old droids from days past and many sharp things. Use portals to travel from each island navigating the island in different ways by using your ability to rotate the mighty islands. Good luck traveler.

Controls:

A - Move left

D - Move right

E - Rotate right

Q - Rotate left

Space Bar - Jump

By:

Luke Sloop

Austin Meyer
